name: Great Wall of Trump
description:
Those pesky illegal aliens want to come into OUR beautiful country of 'merica! They are climbing over the Great Wall of Trump and trying to steal our jobs!

You play as the sole hero, the giant head of Donald Trump, as you gobble up all the illegal aliens and send them back over to where they belong! Those are our jobs! Fuck yeah! America!

Controls:

3DS -- Movement: Cpad or Dpad, Launch: A when inside The Trump Zone

Windows/Mac/Linux -- Movement: Arrows Keys, Launch: A or Space when inside The Trump Zone

Ludum Dare Entry
